code:
%%{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-03.01 — Proposal Lifecycle (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)

[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode] --> DRAFT : ProposalCreated (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
note right of DRAFT
  Authoring & validation:
  • proposalId assigned
  • schema/policy checks
end note

DRAFT --> REVIEW : SubmittedForReview
note right of REVIEW
  Guard reviews (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
  Can request changes or reject
end note

REVIEW --> DRAFT : ChangesRequested
REVIEW --> REJECTED : RejectedAtReview
REVIEW --> OPEN_FOR_VOTE : ApprovedForVoting (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)

OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> OPEN_FOR_VOTE : VoteCast (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> TALLYING : VotingClosed

TALLYING --> DECIDED_APPROVED : VoteTallied → Approved (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
TALLYING --> DECIDED_REJECTED : VoteTallied → Rejected (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)

DECIDED_APPROVED --> EXECUTION : DecisionRecorded (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
DECIDED_REJECTED --> ARCHIVED : DecisionRecorded (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)

EXECUTION --> EXECUTED : PolicyChanged / GrantApproved / ProjectApproved (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
EXECUTION --> EXECUTION_FAILED : ExecutionFailed

EXECUTION_FAILED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
EXECUTION_FAILED --> RETRY_EXEC : RetryAuthorized
RETRY_EXEC --> EXECUTION : ReExecute

EXECUTED --> AUDIT : ExecutionCompleted
AUDIT --> ARCHIVED : AuditLogged (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)

%% Appeals (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)
DECIDED_APPROVED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)
DECIDED_REJECTED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)

APPEAL --> DECIDED_APPROVED : AppealResolved → uphold
APPEAL --> DECIDED_REJECTED : AppealResolved → overturn
APPEAL --> ARCHIVED : AppealWithdrawn

%% Cancellations
DRAFT --> CANCELLED : WithdrawnByAuthor
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> CANCELLED : CancelledByAuthority
CANCELLED --> ARCHIVED : Archived

%% Terminal states
REJECTED --> [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
ARCHIVED --> [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

%% ===== Styling =====
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class DRAFT,REVIEW,OPEN_FOR_VOTE,TALLYING,DECIDED_APPROVED,DECIDED_REJECTED,EXECUTION,EXECUTED,EXECUTION_FAILED,RETRY_EXEC,APPEAL,AUDIT,ARCHIVED,REJECTED,CANCELLED core;
repo_description: The cohersphere architecture — structural blueprint of the resonance network. Defines the modular layers connecting app, API, and governance protocols. Outlines data flows for Proof-of-Contribution, c
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
